This is my writeup of the [CryptoHack Diffie-Hellman challenges](https://cryptohack.org/challenges/diffie-hellman/).

### Additive

```python
p =  
g = 0x02 
A = 
B = 

# In additive group, A = ag   ...private key recovered from simple divsion
a = (A // g) 

s = (a * B) % p
print(s)

#use given decrypt script
crypto{cycl1c_6r0up_und3r_4dd1710n?}
```
